description.value: A CodeSystem to identify the episodicity of a condition.

definition.value: The first episode of a condition.
A new episode of a previously recorded condition.
A review of an existing condition episode.
A flare-up of an existing condition episode.
Marks the end of an existing condition episode.

description.value: A CodeSystem to identify the ethnicity of a Person, as specified by the Person. This vocabulary describes a persons ethnic category, it is an extension of the Ethnic Category Code described in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

display.value: All republics which made up the former USSR
Other republics which made up the former Yugoslavia
Other white European, European unspecified, European mixed

name.value: Care Connect SDS Job Role Name

description.value: A CodeSystem that identifies the job role associated with the person on the smart card. This consists of a set of Role Based Access Control (RBAC) codes. This code list is externally maintained.

display.value: Special Salary Scale in Public Health Medicine
Trust Grade Doctor - House Officer level
Trust Grade Doctor - Specialist Registrar level
Trust Grade Doctor - Career Grade level
A&E Staff Nurse (Temporary) London Cluster Only
Other Community Health Service - Social Care Worker
Other Community Health Service - Admin Clerk
Dental Surgeon acting as Hospital Consultant

description.value: A CodeSystem that identifies the kind of relationship that exists with a target condition.

definition.value: This condition is combined/merged with the target condition to form a single logical condition.
This condition is part of a group that includes the target condition as a member of the group.
This condition replaces a previous condition (i.e. a revised diagnosis). The target condition is now obsolete.
This condition has evolved from the target condition.
This condition follows-on from the target onset condition. Used when specifing a relationship to a previous onset condition when this condition episodicity is Review, Flare or End.

description.value: A CodeSystem that identifies the type of registration for a patient at a healthcare organisation.

name.value: Care Connect NHS Number Verification Status

description.value: A CodeSystem that identifies the trace status of the NHS number. This CodeSystem is comprised of codes from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary: NHS Number Status Indicator Code.

display.value: Trace attempted - No match or multiple match found
Trace needs to be resolved - (NHS number or patient detail conflict)
Number not present and trace not required
Trace postponed (baby under six weeks old)

description.value: A CodeSystem that identifies the status of registration for a patient at the healthcare organisation.
A CodeSystem to identify detail codes for flagged medication issues.
A CodeSystem to identify the level of proficiency in communicating a language.
A CodeSystem that identifies the mode the patient can communicate in, representing the method of expression of the language.
A CodeSystem to identify the category of a condition.
A CodeSystem that identifies the residential status of a patient.
A CodeSystem that identifies the treatment category for this patient.

display.value: Exempt from payment - subject to reciprocal health agreement

description.value: A CodeSystem that identifies the language used by a person.

display.value: Church Slavic; Old Slavonic; Church Slavonic; Old Bulgarian; Old Church Slavonic

description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the religious or other belief system affiliation of a person. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Religious Affiliation SnCT' subset with subset original id 10791000000130; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Religious or other belief system affiliation simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000531000000100.

description.value: A ValueSet to identify the level of proficiency in communicating a language.

name.value: Care Connect SDS Job Role Name

description.value: A ValueSet that identifies the job role associated with the person on the smart card. This consists of a set of Role Based Access Control (RBAC) codes. This code list is externally maintained.
A ValueSet to identify the category of a condition.

A ValueSet to identify the ethnicity of a Person, as specified by the Person. This vocabulary describes a persons ethnic category, it is an extension of the Ethnic Category Code described in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

name.value: Care Connect NHS Number Verification Status

description.value: A ValueSet that identifies the trace status of the NHS number. The CodeSystem is comprised of codes from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary: NHS Number Status Indicator Code.
A ValueSet that identifies the mode the patient can communicate in, representing the method of expression of the language.
A ValueSet that identifies the type of registration for a patient at a healthcare organisation.
A ValueSet that identifies the residential status of a patient.
A ValueSet that identifies the treatment category for this patient.
A ValueSet that identifies the status of registration for a patient at the healthcare organisation.
A ValueSet to identify detail codes for flagged medication issues.
A ValueSet that identifies the kind of relationship that exists with a target condition.
A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that identifies the legal/contractual nature of a prescription.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the e-Prescribing method. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'NHS e-Prescribing method subset' with subset original id 30101000001130; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'ePrescribing method simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000041000001103.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

description.value: A ValueSet that identifies the language used by a person.
A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the severity of an allergy.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

description.value: A ValueSet to identify the episodicity of a condition.

A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes an encounter between a care professional and the patient (or patient's record). The patient may be represented by a third party such as a carer or family member. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'CDA Encounter Type' subset with subset original id 1341000000130; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Clinical document architecture encounter type simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000351000000101.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the e-Prescribing route of administration. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'NHS e-Prescribing route of administration subset' with subset original id 30201000001137; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset FSN is 'ePrescribing route of administration simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000051000001100.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

description.value: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a manufactured material (e.g. a pharmaceutical product or personal medical device). These will form part of the NHS dm+d. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Manufactured Material' subset with subset original id 1391000000139; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Manufactured material simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000031000001105.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

description.value: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person.
A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the certainty of an allergy.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

display.value: Unlikely [The reaction is thought unlikely to have been caused by the agent.]
Likely [The reaction is thought likely to have been caused by the agent.]
